name: Jeremy Allen
text: Gave this place one last chance to make a decent pizza. Despite my better judgment once again was severely disappointed in the pizza.  Take warning travelers: there is nowhere in Mt Vernon to get a decent pizza. Try Berea Papalenos, Apolos, Marios.
